article1.title: Article 1 (Purpose)
article1.content: These terms and conditions are intended to define the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between MJ Studio (hereinafter "Company") and users in relation to the use of ImageFactory (hereinafter "Service") operated by the Company.

article2.title: Article 2 (Definitions)
article2.item1: "Service" refers to the AI image generation platform provided by the Company.
article2.item2: "User" refers to members and non-members who use the Service provided by the Company according to these terms.
article2.item3: "Member" refers to a person who has registered for membership and uses the Service.
article2.item4: "Points" refers to cyber assets for using the Service, used for image generation.

article3.title: Article 3 (Posting and Amendment of Terms)
article3.item1: The Company shall post these terms on the initial screen of the Service so that users can easily understand them.
article3.item2: The Company may amend these terms within the scope that does not violate relevant laws.
article3.item3: When terms are amended, the effective date and reason for amendment shall be announced.

article4.title: Article 4 (Provision and Modification of Service)
article4.intro: The Company provides the following services:
article4.service3: Storage and download of generated images
article4.item2: The Company may change the content of the Service and will notify users in advance of any changes.

article5.title: Article 5 (Point Policy)
article5.item1: Points can be charged through paid payment.
article5.item2: The validity period of charged points is 5 years from the date of charging.
article5.item3: Points are not refundable in cash.
article5.item4: Remaining points are automatically forfeited upon membership withdrawal.

article6.title: Article 6 (Copyright)
article6.item1: The copyright of generated images belongs to the user.
article6.item2: However, generated images cannot be used for illegal purposes.
article6.item3: The Company may use generated images for statistical and analytical purposes to improve the Service.

article7.title: Article 7 (Refund Policy)
article7.seeRefundPage: For detailed refund policy, please refer to the Refund Policy page.

article8.title: Article 8 (Disclaimer)
article8.item1: The Company is exempt from liability if it cannot provide the Service due to force majeure such as natural disasters.
article8.item2: The Company is not responsible for service usage problems caused by the user's fault.
article8.item3: The Company is not responsible for legal issues arising from commercial use of generated images.

principle.title: Basic Principles
principle.item1: Due to the nature of digital content and credits, refunds are generally not available for credits already used and images that have been successfully generated.
principle.item2: Exceptions for refunds or credit restoration are made only in cases of service failures or payment errors that are "not due to user's fault."

unused.title: Completely unused credits after purchase
unused.desc: Full refund if requested within 7 days from purchase date

partial.title: Partially used credits
partial.desc: Used portion is non-refundable; remaining credits are generally non-refundable, reviewed individually only in case of service failure

section2.title: Non-refundable Cases
section2.item1: When image generation is completed successfully: No refund or credit restoration simply because you don't like the results
section2.item2: Free credits: Promotional, bonus, or referral reward credits
section2.item3: Special offers: Products purchased at sale/discount prices (when specified)

section3.title: Refund Request Procedure
section3.intro: Contact customer support via email with the following information:
section3.item4: Reason for refund and related screenshots (error screens if there was a service failure)
section3.processingDesc: Our team will review and respond within 7 business days. If approved, refund will be processed to the original payment method.
section3.processingNote: ‚Äª Actual refund may take up to 14 business days depending on card company/payment processor policies.

section4.title: Service Failures and Exceptions
section4.content: In cases of clear service responsibility such as server failures, credits not charged despite payment, or repeated failures preventing image generation, we will provide full refund or equivalent credits.
section4.note: In case of major outages, we may implement temporary credit restoration or additional credit policies with separate announcements.

section5.title: Policy Changes
section5.item1: ImageFactory's refund policy may be changed periodically for service improvement, with advance notice through announcements or email.
section5.item2: Changed policies apply to payments made after the announced effective date.

contact.title: Refund Inquiries
contact.hours: Weekdays 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM (Closed on weekends and holidays)

article1.title: Article 1 (Purpose of Processing Personal Information)
article1.intro: MJ Studio (hereinafter "Company") processes personal information for the following purposes. Personal information being processed will not be used for purposes other than the following, and if the purpose of use changes, necessary measures such as obtaining separate consent will be implemented.
article1.item1: Member registration and management: Provision of membership services, identity verification
article1.item2: Service provision: AI image generation, result email delivery
article1.item3: Payment and settlement: Point charging, payment processing
article1.item4: Customer support: Inquiry response, complaint handling

article2.title: Article 2 (Personal Information Items Processed)
article2.intro: The Company processes the following personal information items:
article2.auto: Automatically collected: IP address, cookies, service usage records, access logs

article3.title: Article 3 (Retention and Use Period of Personal Information)
article3.item1: The Company processes and retains personal information within the retention period according to laws or within the agreed period when collecting personal information from data subjects.
article3.item2: Personal information is destroyed immediately upon membership withdrawal. However, if there is a reason for retention under relevant laws, it will be kept for that period.

article4.title: Article 4 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
article4.intro: In principle, the Company does not provide users' personal information to third parties. However, the following cases are exceptions:
article4.item1: When the user has given prior consent
article4.item2: When required by law or when requested by investigative agencies according to procedures and methods prescribed by law for investigation purposes

article5.title: Article 5 (Entrustment of Personal Information Processing)
article5.intro: The Company entrusts personal information processing as follows to provide services:
article5.ai: OpenAI, Replicate, etc.: AI image generation

article6.title: Article 6 (Rights and Obligations of Data Subjects and How to Exercise Them)
article6.intro: Users can exercise the following rights at any time:
article6.item2: Request to correct or delete personal information
article6.item3: Request to suspend processing of personal information

article7.title: Article 7 (Destruction of Personal Information)
article7.content: The Company destroys personal information without delay when it is no longer needed due to expiration of retention period, achievement of processing purpose, etc.

article9.title: Article 9 (Operation and Rejection of Cookies)
article9.content: The Company uses cookies to provide customized services to users. Users have the right to choose whether to install cookies and can reject cookies by setting options in their web browser.

pricing.modelPricingDesc: Points vary by model based on quality and generation time

faq1.question: Do points expire?
faq1.answer: Points are valid for 5 years from the date of purchase. You can use them freely within 5 years.

faq2.question: Can I get a refund?
faq2.answer: Yes, refunds are available for unused points. Please check our refund policy for details.

faq3.question: What happens if image generation fails?
faq3.answer: Points are automatically refunded for failed image generations.

faq4.question: Can I use multiple models at once?
faq4.answer: Yes, you can generate images from multiple AI models simultaneously with a single request.
